name: Adele Hirsch
review: “Forget the trendy pizza shops, This hidden spot makes the best New York-style pizza slice in naples”

name: Nina Margaret K.
review: Hilsa, Tenualosa ilisha, is a large anadromous shad that is the national fish of Bangladesh.

name: Angelia Phillips
review: Love me sometimes Sandy's Pizza! They make delicious vegan pizzas on request to add to their buffet!

name: Roger Cooper
review: Love that sweet pepper pizza my lips are still flapping my eyebrows off!!!

name: Wyatt Arvin
review: Best Pizza in Ft. Branch! Plus an added bonus, I paid cash and got a discount!

name: Susan Zenthofer
review: There pizza was so good ☺️. Very friendly service and very fast and clean. This place was awesome.
